def_cn: 怀疑一切的人;持怀疑态度者;有证据才相信的人
def_en: If you describe someone as a doubting Thomas, you mean they refuse to believe something until they see definite proof or evidence of it.

def_cn: 怀疑一切的人;持怀疑态度者;有证据才相信的人
def_en: If you describe someone as a doubting Thomas, you mean they refuse to believe something until they see definite proof or evidence of it.
